send_to_cs: Send to CS if a subscriber mentions a medical issue or an adverse effect from using products from this brand
dos_and_donts: Do not share any medical advice or guidance to subscribers outside of recommending appropriate products or directing them to purchase the right item
Do not comment on their medical situations
Close the covo if the customer says they're receiving too many messages/we're texting them too often - don't send TMT
drive_to_purchase: If cx says they will be ordering soon, offer to schedule a call if they need further assistance with their purchase (shortcut OS) - do not upsell
templates: If cx already purchased, use specific TFP template
promo_and_exclusions: We do not offer any discounts for the SPECTRUM besides the Black Friday Sale discount
If cx reaches out looking for deals, you can share the Black Friday deals here: https://www.capillus.com/collections/black-friday-deals/?token=69JI4

213.customerMessage1: I am still waiting on an order from January 3, 2026.
213.SystemMessage14: Template used: "Order Status and Tracking"; last updated: 2023-11-22 20:13:07.324
213.AgentMessage1:
State Line Tack: Hi there! We usually ship via USPS, and once shipped, it will take 7-10 business days domestically, depending on the method you choose at checkout. If you're referring to Order #1039562, the shipping method used was Economy Shipping. The order is already on its way with an expected delivery date of Jan 15. 

Since your order is already with the courier, the best way to get updates is to contact them directly. Have you tried giving them a call? They should have more detailed information for you. You can also check the status of your order here: https://slt.attn.tv/aQzFrybIEt_c

escalate: No CS for this client, ESC everything
When ESC post-purchase issues, only ask for the order number
If a customer wants to talk to customer service do not send PS, ESC instead
When ESC on weekends, use WKD shortcut before you ESC
When ESC on weekDAYS after 4pm EST, use WKE shortcut before you ESC
tone: Close the convo once the client takes over
Close the convo when customers misanswer the Welcome journey q's
templates: If cx are trying to upload a photo on the website and it's not coming through, use PWU shortcut
If cx are inquiring about delivery dates, use GRN shortcut
If cx share image/screenshot that's not showing don't ask to send again, use IMG shortcut
dos_and_donts: Prices vary, depending on height, not width
Wet Paint T shirts Inc is a different company
drive_to_purchase: Don't recommend and share links for add-ons to cx
promo_and_exclusions: Contact us for help with fundraisers. Grad yard signs are only sold through fundraisers

214.SystemMessage1: Cardboard Cutout Standees: Welcome to Cardboard Cutout Standees! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.
214.SystemMessage2: Cardboard Cutout Standees: Hey this is Jordan, how can I help you?
214.customerMessage1: I need to order 19 fat heads for high school senior ski team. How long would that take to have done?
214.AgentMessage1: Cardboard Cutout Standees: Sorry for the slow reply! We usually ship via UPS, and orders placed by 10 am on a business day will leave our facility the following business day. We have multiple shipping options available at checkout that can deliver orders in as quickly as 1 business day. Check them out here: https://cardboard.attn.tv/aIBZ5Mj2O5iT
214.customerMessage4:
One more question. 
What group rates/cost 
would it be for 19 fat heads?
Thanks
214.AgentMessage2: Cardboard Cutout Standees: You're welcome! I can definitely check on this for you. Can you let me know the size you're looking to get? Can I also have your e-mail address?
214.customerMessage5:
Bethbert@yahoo.com.

Also, you may have on file the fatheads that were ordered last year for Lincoln Sudbury regional high school ski team. Whatever those sizes are is what we will take this year? 
I'm new at this but I will dig and see if o can find out size
214.AgentMessage3: Cardboard Cutout Standees: Thank you. Do you happen to have the order number or the email address used to place last year's order so we can check? For Big Heads, the available sizes are 12, 24, 26, and 47 inches. Let me know!
214.customerMessage6:
Hi,
So I got in touch with the person in charge of the fatheads last year and we ordered 24-26.
I copied and pasted her note below.
Seems like two other important things we would need is same size heads do the girls and boys. 
Also- a clear image of the faces so high quality prints.



Hi, yes that is the size I ordered. However, the boys' fat heads were a lot larger than the girls because they included the long hair on the girls within that size. If you want all faces the same size (which I would recommend because the size difference was significant) there is an option to trim long hair out of the fat head. It's up to you but just wanted to make note of that. Definitely make sure you are getting a print quality digital image for each senior so that they come out clearly. Hope this helps!
214.SystemMessage4: Template used: "Pass to the team - All brands"; last updated: 2023-10-10 17:46:43.559
214.AgentMessage4: Cardboard Cutout Standees: Thanks for the info! I will pass this along to my team and get back to you as soon as possible, hang tight!

templates: For product prescription inquiries use RPP shortcut
For prescription orders questions use RPO shortcut
